title: The After Show Talks About Summer vs Winter Cigar Sales
itunes:title: The After Show Talks About Summer vs Winter Cigar Sales
description:
This week, we discuss how summer smoking selections differs from winter smoking choices. Do people smoke different things based on the season?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
